name: Boss on Parade
effectText: When this card is activated: Add 1 "B.E.S." monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 monster in your hand or field, and if you do, Special Summon 1 LIGHT Machine monster with 1200 ATK and 1000 or less DEF from your Deck to either field. You can banish this card from your GY; place 1 "Boss Rush" from your Deck or GY, face-up on your field. You can only activate 1 "Boss on Parade" per turn.
